SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.messenger.util

Class MsgDemoMap

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.messenger.util.MsgDemoMap
@Deprecated public class MsgDemoMap extends Object
Deprecated.
Use the commons entity at ca.openosp.openo.commn.model.MsgDemoMap
Manages the mapping between messages and patient demographics in the messaging system. This class provides functionality to link messages to specific patients, retrieve message-demographic mappings, and manage these associations.
Since:
2003

  • Constructor Summary

    MsgDemoMap()
    Deprecated.
    Default constructor initializes the MsgDemoMap utility.

  • Constructor Details

    • MsgDemoMap

      public MsgDemoMap()
      Deprecated.
      Default constructor initializes the MsgDemoMap utility.
      Since:

  • Method Details

    • linkMsg2Demo

      public void linkMsg2Demo(String msgId, String demographic_no)
      Deprecated.
      Creates a new link between a message and a patient demographic record. This establishes the association that allows messages to be grouped by patient.
      Parameters:
      msgId - String representation of the message ID to link
      demographic_no - String representation of the patient demographic number
      Since:
      2003

    • getDemoMap2

      public HashMap<String,List<String>> getDemoMap2(String msgId)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves a mapping of demographic numbers to formatted patient names for a specific message. Returns a HashMap where keys are demographic numbers and values are lists of formatted names.
      Parameters:
      msgId - String representation of the message ID to look up
      Returns:
      HashMap<String, List<String>> mapping of demographic numbers to patient name lists
      Since:
      2003

    • getDemoMap

      public Hashtable getDemoMap(String msgId)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves a Hashtable mapping demographic numbers to full patient names for a specific message. This method provides a legacy interface using Hashtable instead of HashMap.
      Parameters:
      msgId - String representation of the message ID to look up
      Returns:
      Hashtable mapping demographic numbers to full patient names
      Since:
      2003

    • getMsgVector

      public List<String> getMsgVector(String demographic_no)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves a list of message IDs associated with a specific patient demographic number. This method returns all messages linked to the given patient.
      Parameters:
      demographic_no - String representation of the patient demographic number
      Returns:
      List<String> list of message IDs associated with the patient
      Since:
      2003

    • getMsgList

      public List<String> getMsgList(String demographic_no, Integer type)
      Deprecated.
      Retrieves a list of message IDs associated with a specific patient and message type. This method filters messages by both demographic number and message type.
      Parameters:
      demographic_no - String representation of the patient demographic number
      type - Integer representing the message type to filter by
      Returns:
      List<String> list of message IDs matching the patient and type criteria
      Since:
      2003

    • unlinkMsg

      public void unlinkMsg(String demographic_no, String messageID)
      Deprecated.
      Removes the link between a message and a patient demographic record. This method deletes the mapping between the specified message and patient.
      Parameters:
      demographic_no - String representation of the patient demographic number
      messageID - String representation of the message ID to unlink
      Since:
      2003
